column4: hello, where is the download for ubuntu server for a 64 bit intel processor?
they all look the same to me =/
and I beleive it has 64 bit support
allthough I am running 32 bit windows
core i something or core 2 something?
but, isn't that only amd cpu support?
I thought thats why it said amd64...
the intel 64 bit architecture is for servers
the desktop computers with intel 64 bit chips use amd64
if you want the server edition, yes
